snippet: The problem, which began at 8:30 a.m. and ended by 10:30 a.m., involved communication errors between dispatchers and United’s headquarters in Chicago.
abstract: Computer failure at United Airlines holds up 250 scheduled flights, delaying thousands of travelers and embarrassing the airline at time when it has been trying to win back customers after problems earlier in year.
lead_paragraph: The problem, which began at 8:30 a.m. and ended by 10:30 a.m., involved communication errors between dispatchers and United’s headquarters in Chicago.

headline.main: United Airlines’ Flights Are Delayed by a Computer Failure
headline.print_headline: United Airlines’ Flights Are Delayed by a Computer Failure
